column2: "Matoi is doing well. She's up and around and trying to get better herself."
"Her memory is gone, but she doesn't seem to be letting that get to her."
"Honestly if it's not a detriment to anyone, I don't think she needs to remember."
"When people forget something to this degree it's often because the memory is too painful to deal with."
"If she could forget that and just be happy I think that would be best."
